channel.title: Duel arena 3 players Dupe
channel.description:
[youtube]1dDRnj8MUzo[/youtube]
if you didnt understand the video here is a example: theres 3 players: craig, god, peyton. craig has the item that's gonna be duped craig and god both duel peyton peyton accepted god's duel nad both of them go to the 2nd duel window peyton accepts craig's duel through the chat craig puts up items peyton and craig go to the second window now peyton accepts and god accepts peyton and god are in a duel, craig is still in the 2nd window peyton wins the duel and gets items craig declines and gets his items back
please help me fix hard im using 317 pi

item.title: Duel arena 3 players Dupe
item.dc:creator: @sleman sleman
item.description:
@sleman wrote:

ive fixed i did not use any of the posts here but thanks alot here is the fix posted for others https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664425.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Duel arena 3 players Dupe
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:545449”]Make it so you can’t accept another duel whilst currently in a duel.

[quote]
Why shouldn’t you join, is the question you should be asking yourself! Pk-Alive is a fun enjoyable server where you can always PK, no matter what! The server is packed with content, and this server is not buggy![/quote]

wat[/quote]

RandQm:

Add a simple check to see if a player is setting up a duel already in which case he can’t accept another one.

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:545449”][code=java]public boolean isDueling = false;

public void acceptDuel() {
c.getDuelAndTrade().isDueling = true;
//The rest of it here…
}

public boolean requestDuel() {
if(c.getDuelAndTrade().isDueling) {
c.sendMessage(“That player is already in a duel!”);
return false;
}
// The other code here.
}
[/code][/quote]

@OP did you even any of the posts above? It’s a one line fix

[code=java]
public void requestDuel(Player player) {

if (player.duelStatus > 0 || otherPlayer.duelStatus > 0) return;

…

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Duel arena 3 players Dupe
item.dc:creator: @sleman sleman
item.description:
@sleman wrote:

[youtube]1dDRnj8MUzo[/youtube]

if you didnt understand the video here is a example:
theres 3 players: craig, god, peyton. craig has the item that’s gonna be duped
craig and god both duel peyton
peyton accepted god’s duel nad both of them go to the 2nd duel window
peyton accepts craig’s duel through the chat
craig puts up items
peyton and craig go to the second window
now peyton accepts and god accepts
peyton and god are in a duel, craig is still in the 2nd window
peyton wins the duel and gets items
craig declines and gets his items back

please help me fix hard im using 317 pi

Read full topic
